s: So, when I see a brand new product like this has been released, I instantly jump on it and I would highly recommend fans of drums and percussion do the same. Just In Time - The Final Recording is as it says on the title. It's the last professionally recorded performance of the legend that is Buddy Rich...

t: RICH,BUDDY - Complete Buddy Rich: 1957-1962 - Amazon.com Music
s: Great part two collection of Buddy Rich's works. By far the greatest drummer to ever play drums. Bought this with the 1946-1956 collection for my father for Christmas.

t: RICH,BUDDY - 7 Classic Albums - Amazon.com Music
s: Very good value. However, there are only 6 albums in this collection: Blues Caravan, Buddy Rich In Miami, Buddy Rich Just Sings, Sing and Swing With Buddy Rich, The Voice Is Rich and The Wailing Buddy Rich. The Gene Krupa / Buddy Rich album Burnin' Beat is not on any of the discs.

t: Buddy Rich on Amazon Music

t: Buddy Rich - Time Out - Amazon.com Music
s: When I buy a Buddy Rich CD, I am looking for great band lead by a driving drummer. This CD has both. Recorded while the band was touring, the band creates some tight ensemble playing on great arrangements. Buddy is Buddy. Pushing the band to another great performance.
